static get_bounds_from_dataset(dataset: Dataset) → Tuple[ndarray, ndarray, float, float, CRS]¶

Get image bounds in a given coordinate system.

Args:

crs: Desired coordinate system.

Returns:

x_bounds: x_min, x_max of the image in the target coordinate system y_bounds: y_min, y_max of the image in the target coordinate system pixel_width pixel_height

static load(filepath: str, mode: int = 0, crs: CRS = None) → Dataset¶
static load_from_viirs_hdf5(filepath: str, output_filepath: str = None) → Dataset¶

Load a VIIRS HDF5 file.

Parameters¶

filepath

Path to the VIIRS HDF5 file.

crs

Desired coordinate system. Defaults to None, which means the coordinate system of the VIIRS file will be used.

Returns¶

data

Image data.

name = 'gdal_dataset'¶
static save(filepath, data, driver: str = 'GTiff')¶

The alternative is to flush the cache and then re-open from disk.

class night_horizons.data_io.ImageIO¶

Bases: DataIO

static load(filepath: str, dtype: str | type = 'uint8', img_shape: Tuple = (1200, 1920)) → ndarray¶

Load an image from disk.

Parameters¶

filepath

Location of the image.

dtype

Datatype. Defaults to integer from 0 to 255.

img_shape

Image dimensions, used if loading a file of the ‘.raw’ type.

Returns¶

img

Image as a numpy array.
